overview.en: Singapore, serving the six industries of film and television, talent show, live broadcast, advertising, sports and electricity, also known as pan-cultural and entertainment industry. The star city plan aims to establish a pan-cultural and entertainment ecological operation platform with fair and equitable environment, safe and reliable data, and privacy protection, aiming to reshape the ecology of pan-cultural and entertainment industry and achieve industrial integration, upgrading, expansion and development through decentralized operation mechanism and aiming at the pain points that traditional Internet cannot effectively solve.
overview.zh: 星城计划由新加坡CIF基金会发起并运营管理，服务于影视、选秀、直播、广告、体育、电竞六大产业，又称泛文娱产业。星城计划旨在通过去中心化的运营机制，针对传统互联网无法有效解决的痛点，建立一个环境公平公正、数据安全可信、保护个人隐私的泛文娱生态运营平台，目标重塑泛文娱产业的生态，实现产业整合、升级、扩大及发展。
